001package ca.gc.cra.radar.infrastructure.capture.libpcap;
002
003/**
004 * Represents an activated libpcap handle.
005 *
006 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
007 */
008public interface PcapHandle extends AutoCloseable {
009  /**
010     * Applies a BPF filter string (runs {@code pcap_compile} + {@code pcap_setfilter}).
011   *
012   * @param bpf tcpdump-style filter expression
013   * @throws PcapException if filter compilation or application fails
014   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
015   */
016  void setFilter(String bpf) throws PcapException;
017
018  /**
019   * Blocks until the next packet or timeout and forwards it to the callback.
020   *
021   * @param cb callback invoked with packet metadata and bytes
022   * @return {@code true} if a packet was delivered; {@code false} on EOF (offline capture)
023   * @throws PcapException if libpcap returns an error
024   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
025   */
026  boolean next(Pcap.PacketCallback cb) throws PcapException;
027
028  /**
029   * Returns the link-layer type reported by libpcap (DLT_* constant).
030   *
031   * @return data link type identifier
032   * @throws PcapException if the value cannot be retrieved
033   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
034   */
035  int dataLink() throws PcapException;
036
037  /**
038   * Closes the underlying capture handle.
039   *
040   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
041   */
042  @Override
043  void close();
044}
